Class Book

java.lang.Object
com.lms.library.model.LibraryItem
com.lms.library.model.Book
public final class Book extends LibraryItem
Represents a book in the library system. Extends LibraryItem and contains book-specific properties like ISBN, genre, and page count.
Since:
2025
Version:
1.0
Author:
Joel Silva

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book()
      Default constructor for Book. Required for serialization and dependency injection frameworks.

    • Book

      public Book(String title, String author, LocalDate publicationDate, String isbn, String genre, int pageCount)
      Constructs a new Book with specified details.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the book
      author - the author of the book
      publicationDate - the date when the book was published
      isbn - the International Standard Book Number
      genre - the genre of the book
      pageCount - the number of pages in the book
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if pageCount is not positive

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Gets the type of library item. Always returns "BOOK" for Book instances.
      Specified by:
      getType in class LibraryItem
      Returns:
      the string "BOOK"
